FLAVOUR_0_DESC.message: Contact the local Interstellar Pilots' Fuel Co-operative representative.

FLAVOUR_0_MEMBER_INTRO.message: Faodaidh sibh connadh a cheannach is cuidhteas fhaighinn dhe {radioactives} an-seo.

FLAVOUR_0_NONMEMBER_INTRO.message: Tha {clubname} ’na bhuidheann neo-eisimeileach a tha ag amas connadh soithich-fhànais saor a thoirt dha bhuill. Tha meuran againn air feadh an reul-chriosa. Seo na buannachdan a gheibh thu ma ghabhas tu ballrachd:

FLAVOUR_1_CLUBNAME.description: Fuel club for the Federation faction

FLAVOUR_1_DESC.description: Fuel club for the Federation faction
FLAVOUR_1_DESC.message: Authorized contact for The Federal Fuel Foundation.

FLAVOUR_1_NONMEMBER_INTRO.message: Tha {clubname} ’na phrìomh-sholaraiche airson connadh saor dha shoithichean-fànais a bhall ann an Caidreachas na Grèine. Seo na gheibh sibh às a’ bhallrachd:

FLAVOUR_2_CLUBNAME.description: Fuel club for the CIW (Commonwealth of Independent Worlds) faction

FLAVOUR_2_DESC.description: Fuel club for the CIW (Commonwealth of Independent Worlds) faction
FLAVOUR_2_DESC.message: Make an appointment to speak with the Commonwealth Fuel Union.

FLAVOUR_2_NONMEMBER_INTRO.description: Commonwealth of Independent Worlds is the name of the CIW faction
FLAVOUR_2_NONMEMBER_INTRO.message: Air feadh fànais aibhsich Co-fhlaitheas nan Saoghal Neo-eisimeileach saor, ’s e {clubname} a tha san t-solaraiche as fheàrr dhut airson seirbheisean connaidh is stiùiridh sgudail saora. Seo na nì sinn airson ar ball:

FLAVOUR_2_WELCOME.message: Fàilte! Tha sinn an dòchas gun còrd an t-seirbheis againn dhut.

FLAVOUR_3_CLUBNAME.description: Fuel club for the Haber faction

FLAVOUR_3_DESC.description: Fuel club for the Haber faction
FLAVOUR_3_DESC.message: Branch office of the Haber Propellant and Perishables Division.

FLAVOUR_3_MEMBER_INTRO.description: For the greedy Haber faction, very corporate formulated
FLAVOUR_3_MEMBER_INTRO.message: Fàilte, a phaidhleit. Chaidh na còirichean ath-chonnachaidh is glanaidh sgudail chumhaich a thoirt dhuibh.

FLAVOUR_3_NONMEMBER_INTRO.message: Fàilte, a’ phaidhleit. Seo Roinn Stutha-iomain is Meathach Haber agus tha sinn an urra ri sgaoileadh a’ chonnaidh air feadh fànas muinntir Thàbair.

LIST_BENEFITS_FUEL_INTRO.message: Stòrasan connaidh againn fhèin nach eil an eisimeil air a’ mhargadh choitcheann

LIST_BENEFITS_FUEL_TANK.message: Fuel tank refilling, once per day

LIST_BENEFITS_JOIN.message: Gabhaibh ballrachd an-dràsta! Chan eil ballrachd bliadhnail ach {membership_fee}

REFUEL_FREE.message: Refuel internal fuel tank for free.

WE_WILL_ONLY_DISPOSE_OF.message: Cha ghabh sinn cùram air an uiread de {radioactives} ach na cheannaich sibh dhe {military_fuel} uainn.

WHAT_CONDITIONS_APPLY.message: Dè na cumhaichean ach an gabh sibh cùram de {radioactives}?

YOU_ARE_NOW_A_MEMBER.message: Tha thu ’nad bhall a-nis. Falbhaidh an ùine air do bhallrachd {expiry_date}.

YOU_MUST_BUY.message: Feumaidh tu {military_fuel} a cheannach uainn mus gabh sinn ris na {radioactives} agaibh
